definition: to spread out/to develop/to overflow/to amplify/superfluous

sentences.english: Optical Imaging and Aberrations, Part II. Wave Diffraction Optics
sentences.chinese: 光学成像和失常，第二部分。波衍射光学

sentences.english: The physical and chemical properties of the carbon black are detected, and its microstructure is analysed by High Revolution Electromicroscopy (HREM) and X-ray Diffraction.
sentences.chinese: 射线衍射和高分辨率透射电镜分析了样品的微观结构。

sentences.english: This paper describes two microcomputer programs of electron diffraction spot patterns.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了两种电子衍射花样的微型机分析程序。

sentences.english: In this case the wave is said to have been diffracted .
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，据说，波发生了衍射。

sentences.english: The structure of nickel film is analyzed by using SEM and X-ray diffractometer .
sentences.chinese: 利用电镜和X衍射对镍膜的结构进行了分析。

sentences.english: Laser diffraction also may be referred to as laser sieve analysis.
sentences.chinese: 激光衍射也指激光筛滤分析。

sentences.english: Focal depth of laser beam is advanced by diffraction optical element in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文使用衍射光学元件来提高激光束的焦深。

sentences.english: The X ray diffraction exhibited that this type of the compounds was monoclinic system.
sentences.chinese: 射线衍射分析表示该类化合物均属斜方晶系。

sentences.english: The effect of time-varied wave field on the diffraction tomography was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 初步分析了时变入射波场对衍射层析成像的影响。

sentences.english: Electron diffraction results show that these films are amorphous.
sentences.chinese: 电子衍射结果表明薄膜是非晶态的。

sentences.english: Taking single slit as an example, the relationship between phase error and resulting accuracy is given.
sentences.chinese: 以单缝衍射为例，讨论了误差相位与计算精度的联系。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the mean one-way "diffraction loss" in …
sentences.chinese: 且讨论了多镜非稳腔的平均单程“衍射损耗”。

sentences.english: The Polarization noise caused by gratings and Polarizers has been computed and mea- sured.
sentences.chinese: 由于光栅引起的极化噪声与光栅的衍射效率有关。

sentences.english: The high diffraction efficiency of three kinds of holographic plates have been obtained.
sentences.chinese: 得到了三种全息干板的高衍射效率。

sentences.english: And there is a technique known as x-ray diffraction.
sentences.chinese: 而且有种X光衍射的技术。

sentences.english: Phase identification is performed by X-ray diffractometry.
sentences.chinese: 采用X射线衍射确定薄膜物相。
